name: Pacman (Code Worm)
description:
This is a game made by the Code Worm team for the class "Game Productions" at UCF. The team of 4 had 1 week to make a game based on a previous one along with an aesthetic twist. Our team decided Pac man with a vaporwave feel.  We were like wise told to make 2 separate levels as displayed in our game. 

Controls: 
Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move , Escape to leave the game, and mouse to click through. 

How to Play: 
Move around the map collecting pellets. When you collect all the pellets, you go to the next round. Keep playing until the ghosts take away your lives. After an amount of pellets, fruit will spawn. This will increase your points. You can use openings in the level to teleport from one section to another, and use large pellets to eat ghosts in order to gain even more points. The goal is to try to beat your highscore.
